soccer.common

Class Ball

  • java.lang.Object
    • soccer.common.MovingObj
      • soccer.common.Ball

  • public class Ball
extends MovingObj
    This class describes a ball.
    Author:
    Yu Zhang; Vadim Kyrylov (since 2006)

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      int controllerId
      The ball controller's id.
      char controllerType
      This describes which team has the control of the ball.
      boolean isFree
      true if is not controlled by anybody
      boolean isGrabbed
      true is grabbed with the mouse or by the goalie

      • Fields inherited from class soccer.common.MovingObj

        position

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Ball()
      Construct an empty ball. controllerType is set to 'f', controllerId is set to 0, position is set to (0,0).
      Ball(Vector2d position, char controllerType, int controllerId)
      Construct a ball.

    • Method Summary

      • Methods inherited from class soccer.common.MovingObj

        calcDirectionAndSpeed, getAcceleration, getDirection, getPosition, getSpeed, getVelocity, setAcceleration, setDirection, setPosition, setSpeed, setVelocity

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        clone, equals, finalize, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Field Detail

      • controllerType

        public char controllerType
        This describes which team has the control of the ball. 'l' means left team , 'r' means right team and 'f' means the ball is free.

      • controllerId

        public int controllerId
        The ball controller's id.

      • isFree

        public boolean isFree
        true if is not controlled by anybody

      • isGrabbed

        public boolean isGrabbed
        true is grabbed with the mouse or by the goalie

    • Constructor Detail

      • Ball

        public Ball()
        Construct an empty ball. controllerType is set to 'f', controllerId is set to 0, position is set to (0,0).

      • Ball

        public Ball(Vector2d position,
    char controllerType,
    int controllerId)
        Construct a ball.
        Parameters:
        position - the location of the ball.
        controllerType - the ball player's side.
        controllerId - the player's number.
